::Zardus::

Zardus watches Lady Hawk talk. This wasn't getting anywhere. He leans 
forward again.

"I have a proposal for you," he says, taking another datapad and 
sliding it across the table toward Lady Hawk. "The Destrons, allies 
of the Alliance, have sent me some information on technology that 
they had developed to engeneer warriors. If you help me produce a 
successful creation, working together with Squizzy possibly, I will 
let you go. The datapad has some basic information on this."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk leaned back, sitting straight as if she were sitting in a 
throne.
> "I would do anything to protect that technology." Her royal stare 
making her
> eyes narrow,  "Squizzy didn't understand the full potential of the
> technology, I couldn't afford to have her make a mistake and hurt 
us all."
> she shifted her gaze as Zardus gave instructions to Wheeljack, 
watching the
> movements of the two bots carefully. "I only seek science on this 
sorry
> ditball of a planet." The female bot used a monotone voice sounding
> uninterested in her science, and the planet where it was to be used.
